title: FS: T227 Miners extra Ty Cobb BVG 1.5
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: FS: T227 Miners extra Ty Cobb BVG 1.5
posts.post_content:
Card presents well. The front has some light creases but overall presents better than a 1.5. The back has some writing and paper loss that cause the grade to only be a 1.5. Price is $2500. Please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if you have any questions. thanks!
